page.title: 13CHANGES (CONTINUED)
page.content: { Mechanisation}of Estate operations has had a major effect on the number of people employed and more work is being done with the aid of machines by far fewer people. The Estate grounds,which were originally very private,are now used much more by local organisations such as cricket,football and pony clubs. Scouts and guides have their camps in the grounds and{Dunecht House gardens} are opened for charity twice every year. These are the main changes noted on the Estate by{Lord Cowdray. }
